refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function sets MicroDAQ AO outputs. An array or single channel number has to be provided as a 'channels' parameter. To find out what analog output ranges support your device, type 'mdaq_ao_write' in Scilab console. Usage description contains valid information about connected MicroDAQ device. The 'data' parameter contais AO voltage values.

listitem.para: channels: Single channel or array of channels numbers to read
range: Analog output range, integer number according to MDAQ device version - check usage description.
data : Array or single voltage Analog Output (AO) value

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // write 2, 4, 6 , 8 AI channel with 1, 2, 3, 4 voltage value mdaq_ao_write([2, 4, 6, 8], 1, [1, 2, 3, 4]);
refsection.para: Calling function with link_id for better performance
